A

AmaExtensions - Class in com.ibm.es.ama.zing.converter.converters.xslt
Since V12.0.1, Watson Explorer oneWEX provides developers an option to use XSL stylesheets for customizing conversion of the ingested documents.

C

com.ibm.es.ama.zing.converter.converters.xslt - package com.ibm.es.ama.zing.converter.converters.xslt
 
concat(NodeIterator, String) - Static method in class com.ibm.es.ama.zing.converter.converters.xslt.AmaExtensions
The ama:concat function returns a string concatenation of the set of values contained in the expression argument.
crawlEnqueueUrl(String) - Static method in class com.ibm.es.ama.zing.converter.converters.xslt.AmaExtensions
During the dataset ingestion, calling this function adds an URL to the crawl queue, and schedules it for a crawl.
